title: "Brain chip allows paralysed man to ‘write’ on screen"
excerpt: "Researchers in the US have developed a method of communication for people with paralysis that uses a computer to turn mental handwriting into on-screen words. As part of a new study, a paralysed man used his brain to write on a screen at speeds almost as fast as an able-bodied adult texting on a smartphone,"
